experiences.description: Working closely with the co-founder and building many new pages and core features on Reactjs and Material UI.Build Landing Pages of Qwikskills as per Figma Design on Nextjs and integrate APIs.

Built the whole web app from scratch with Reactjs and Typescript. Built a Component Library with a Design System in place with Stitches that Helped with building new pages for the app in no time. Reintegrated the whole APIs from AWS Amplify to Django Backend. Redesigned the web app and landing page UI as per Figma Design on Next js and Typescript

Worked closely with the founder and implemented many core features on web-app on Reactjs, MaterialUI and Tailwind css. Redesigned the landing page as per design on Reactjs.

aboutpara: Hello there! I'm Ayush Tripathi, a passionate frontend developer with a keen eye for design and a love for crafting delightful user experiences. One of my primary motivations is creating digital products that users love. I believe that the best user experiences are born when design and functionality work harmoniously, and that is what I strive to achieve in every project. I believe in the power of technology to bring positive change, and I'm driven by the desire to create web interfaces that leave a lasting impression on users. Technology is constantly evolving, and I am a strong advocate of lifelong learning. I stay updated with the latest frontend trends, tools, and best practices to keep my skills sharp.
